task_text: [Epidemiology][Comparative-Analysis] Compare mortality-rate reporting frameworks in the WHO COVID-19 document and CDC Pandemic Flu guidelines.

gold_end_state.summary: WHO guidance centers on harmonized mortality surveillance across countries, encouraging standardized definitions and excess-mortality analyses, while CDC pandemic-flu guidelines provide national-level reporting frameworks tailored to influenza mortality assessment; both stress data completeness and timeliness for policy decisions.

quiz.question: What analytic approach does WHO recommend for capturing underreported deaths?
